Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near 15th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near 15th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near 15th due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
